sentence.Network_en: I was a chatterbox at school.
sentence.Network_cn: 上学那会儿，我是个话痨。

sentence.Network_en: That chatterbox would talk 24 hours a day if she didn't sleep at night.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个话匣子如果晚上不用睡觉的话,可以二十四小时喋喋不休.

sentence.Network_en: Frivolous talk is hurtful talk ; besides, it is unbecoming to be chatterbox.
sentence.Network_cn: 轻浮的谈话是有害的; 而且, 做一个喋喋不休的人实在很不体面.

entry.def: A chatterbox is someone who talks a lot.

example.ex: I was a chatterbox at school.
example.tran: 上学那会儿，我是个话痨。

means.word_mean: 1. orchid growing along streams or ponds of western North America having leafy stems and 1 greenish-brown and pinkish flower in the axil of each upper leaf
2. an obnoxious and foolish and loquacious talker

list.explanation: 机关枪，(二次大战时)防空高射机枪

sentences.en: I must take another picture of my chatterbox!
